nodes.bodyText:
Why dont just extend previous test instead of creating a new one?
They seem to be similar
In the previous case we actually are checking for the class name and in this case it is just the * so i guess both need to be check
Can you please rename it to make it clearer what the difference is?
Since it also a test for the Illegal-Classes , So isn't the name is fine?

I think "testIllegalClassesStarImport" sounds better

This seems fine.I will edit it
I understand, but it is better to make name that shows idea of test case.
I got it ! Made the respective changes! Thanks for the help
